Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model

Class DiagonalPatternObjective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model.Objectives
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model.DiagonalPatternObjective
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DiagonalPatternObjective extends Objectives
This class represents pattern-oriented objectives, i.e. objectives that give points only if a certain card pattern is present on a given player table. It extends the Objectives class.
See Also:
